alert.normal-title: Redemption will not destroy the Digital Collection you participate in redemption
alert.destroy-title: Redemption will destroy your Digital Collection participating in the redemption
alert.normal-desc: It will be marked, and the marked Digital Collection cannot participate in other exchanges again.
alert.destroy-desc: This operation is irreversible and cannot be retrieved once destroyed.
alert.normal: The Digital Collection participating in the activity will be still owned by redeemer but marked as redeemed on chain. Redeemed Digital Collection cannot be involved in other redeem activities anymore.
alert.destroy: The Digital Collection participating in the activity will be destroyed and cannot be retrieved once destroyed.
